definition: square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively

sentences.english: Imagine a tick-tack-toe grid in your viewfinder.
sentences.chinese: 想象取景器中一点一点移动的栅格。

sentences.english: Raster-based data formats tend to behave much more like images.
sentences.chinese: 基于栅格的数据格式更类似于图像。

sentences.english: Instead they use materials with lattice structures for both positive and negative electrodes.
sentences.chinese: 取而代之的是在正极和负极上使用栅格结构材料。

sentences.english: Change its color to a pinkish orange then rasterize all three shapes.
sentences.chinese: 改变它的颜色粉红橙色然后栅格三种外形。

sentences.english: The comparisons between computation and experimental data are made, and the detailed flow structure near grid fin is shown and examined.
sentences.chinese: 计算与实验数据以及栅格翼附近流场结构进行了比较。

sentences.english: New firmware for the DP1 adds composition grids for most shooting modes, too.
sentences.chinese: DP1的新固件在大多数拍摄模式中增加了栅格结构。

sentences.english: Right-click on the layer and click Rasterize Type.
sentences.chinese: 右键图层然后点击栅格化文字。

sentences.english: Chaos grid pre-processing model (CGPM) is constructed based on chaotic theory.
sentences.chinese: 基于混沌过程理论构造混沌栅格预处理模型。

sentences.english: How to convert GIS rasters into vector polygons?
sentences.chinese: 如何将GIS栅格到矢量多边形？

sentences.english: The high voltage difference between the two pairs of grids powerfully accelerates the extracted ions.
sentences.chinese: 两幅栅格电压的巨大差别可以大幅加速提取的离子。

sentences.english: Layouts based on grids are not appropriate in all cases.
sentences.chinese: 基于栅格的版式设计并非适用于一切案例。

sentences.english: Many of the pages that you see everyday have a grid.
sentences.chinese: 你日常所见的许多页面都有栅格存在。

sentences.english: The gratings were made from boxwood.
The overnight grid also offers a way to trade morning gaps.
sentences.chinese: 隔夜栅格同时给出了一个在早晨缺口处交易的方法。

sentences.english: Or use different grids for feature material and regular recurring departments.
sentences.chinese: 或是为特别专题和常规内容使用不同的栅格。

sentences.english: The second structure seems to be some kind of giant targeting grid, also north of the Shule river.
sentences.chinese: 这座构造体似乎是某种瞄准栅格，也在疏勒河北面。

definition: broken line (continuous figure made up of straight line segments)/polygonal line/dog leg
form (used in programming languages such as Visual Basic and Delphi to create a GUI window)
